mapper.select:
SELECT aht.ID_ AS taskId, aht.START_TIME_ AS startTime, aht.END_TIME_ AS endTime, aht.PROC_INST_ID_ AS processId, aht.NAME_ AS taskName, arp.NAME_ AS taskType, ahp.START_USER_ID_ as applayName FROM act_hi_taskinst aht LEFT JOIN act_re_procdef arp ON aht.PROC_DEF_ID_ = arp.ID_ LEFT JOIN act_hi_procinst ahp on ahp.PROC_INST_ID_ = aht.PROC_INST_ID_ WHERE aht.ASSIGNEE_ = #{taskAssigin} and aht.DELETE_REASON_ = 'completed'
ORDER BY aht.END_TIME_ DESC
